item.title: By: Owen
item.dc:creator: Owen
item.description: Is it only me, or does it look like someone shit on it's head?
item.content:encoded: Is it only me, or does it look like someone shit on it’s head?

item.title: By: Owen
item.dc:creator: Owen
item.description:
This website pisses me off for some reason.... such a simple, ubiquitous looking character... I can't take them seriously.
I definitely wouldn't let them build me a website.
item.content:encoded:
This website pisses me off for some reason…. such a simple, ubiquitous looking character… I can’t take them seriously.

I definitely wouldn’t let them build me a website.
